review: We had the pleasure of consulting Dr. Sampat Kumar Shettigar, *** ** *** **** ************* ***** ************ He's an exceptional doctor who embodies humility and politeness. Dr. Shettigar takes the time to thoroughly explain everything, offering clear guidance on what to do and what not to do. His approach is incredibly understanding, and he's willing to answer all questions. Moreover, he's a prudent medic who prescribes minimal yet effective medication, ensuring quick recovery. Thank you Sir.

my daughter was down with dengue last year,  sampath sir took good care of her and referred her to the right hospital and even gave a reference letter. very nice doctor who explains things in a detailed way.  highly recommend
We met the doctor first time in kinder hospital, he is so friendly with the kids and he explain the problem very well to the parents.i strongly recommend Dr Sampath sir.thank you.
He explains everything with patience and in detail…very good doctor he take care of kids very nicely amd friendly….i love about him is!!he is very genuine I really appreciate him…..
